description: Are you using your iPhone to its full potential?
title: 7 hidden iPhone tricks you probably never knew about
title_page: 7 hidden iPhone tricks you probably never knew about
text:
Are you using your iPhone to its full potential?
With all the features and constant updates, it’s easy to overlook some of the tricks your Apple software can do for you.
»RELATED VIDEO: 7 awesome technologies we’ll see by 2030
For example, a lot of users think inputting a wrong number in the iPhone calculator means you have to start all over. But you can actually erase a digit by swiping right or left.
Watch the video below from Business Insider for more of your iPhone’s hidden tips and tricks:
More on BusinessInsider.com.
